casebody.data:
Drum et al., Appellees, v. Washlock et al.; Mayfield City Board of Education, Appellant.

[Cite as Drum v. Washlock (2001), 91 Ohio St.3d 207.]

(No. 00-1706 Submitted February 28, 2001 Decided March 28, 2001.) Thomas J. Downs, for appellant.

The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed on the authority of Stevens v. Ackman (2001), 91 Ohio St.3d 182, 743 N.E.2d 901.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur.
